Uses of Package
pulse.search.math

  • Packages that use pulse.search.math 
    Package Description
    pulse.problem.statements
    Introduces various problem statements for the heat conduction problem in the laser flash experiment.
    pulse.search.direction
    Provides a list of PathSolvers and associated classes, which are used to determine the direction of the minimum of a specific SearchTask using an iterative approach.
    pulse.search.linear
    Provides classes that are able to search for the minimum of a scalar function of a vector variable that is unimodal on a specific Segment.
    pulse.search.math
    Provides general math functionality that is used when finding the direction (a Vector) of the minimum, including operations with vector and matrices.
    pulse.tasks
    Introduces the SearchTask, which is the main actor in PULsE, and the TaskManager, a high-level class which among other functions manages loading and executing SearchTasks.
  • Classes in pulse.search.math used by pulse.problem.statements 
    Class Description
    IndexedVector
    A Vector with components that have been associated with NumericPropertyKeywords.
  • Classes in pulse.search.math used by pulse.search.direction 
    Class Description
    Matrix
    A class used to represent small matrices, generally used in optimisation.
    Vector
    This is a general class for Vector operations useful for optimisation.
  • Classes in pulse.search.math used by pulse.search.linear 
    Class Description
    IndexedVector
    A Vector with components that have been associated with NumericPropertyKeywords.
    Segment
    A Segment is simply a pair of values a and b such that a < b.
    Vector
    This is a general class for Vector operations useful for optimisation.
  • Classes in pulse.search.math used by pulse.search.math 
    Class Description
    IndexedVector
    A Vector with components that have been associated with NumericPropertyKeywords.
    Matrix
    A class used to represent small matrices, generally used in optimisation.
    Segment
    A Segment is simply a pair of values a and b such that a < b.
    Vector
    This is a general class for Vector operations useful for optimisation.
  • Classes in pulse.search.math used by pulse.tasks 
    Class Description
    IndexedVector
    A Vector with components that have been associated with NumericPropertyKeywords.
